roleset.name: feeling agitated and in need of scratching

example.name: adjectival rel: itchy
example.text: Maybe if I 'm getting bloody noses all over the place , my eyes are red and itchy because I 'm so dried out by the new allergy meds

because I'm so dried out by the new allergy meds
